Articles.Content: Floor 3468: Dog warehouse for any dogs you might need
Floor 3469: Dogware house.
Floor 3469: You step out of the elevator to discover a time-space distortion that causes you to go down three floors.
Floor 3466, again: Both elevators and this trick are banned, so the game immediately teleports you to floor 3470, which is warm and bad

3470: A swamp. Doesn’t seem to be a holodeck, as shouting “End Program” doesn’t make the scene go away. All indications are that this place is, in fact, a swamp. You walk for a bit and stumble across a concrete pad with a dashed X and faintly yellow edge, You see there are mor pads, as well as what look like a hangar, a warehouse, a small office, and an ATC tower. They’re somewhat camouflaged by the growth and their neutral gray color. Wet mattresses lay stinking in the open-air loading area.

A light freighter about the size of a C-27 Spartan comes in to land and collect the mattresses. At the same time you see teams of… hunters? drag in more mattresses.

You then spot a sign: Bridge’s End Squornshellous Zeta Cargo Spaceport SZTBE

3471: nothing but a click.....??????

Edited June 20, 2023 by kspbutitscursed
3472: Fleur Delacour
3473 arry poter
3474: Fleur de Lis
Floor 3475: the madness meltery, where they melt madness

Floor 3476

The madness foundry, where they cast madness into refined chunks for later use.
Floor 3477: The Homemad Tale.
3478: you sea a pair of red eyes looking at you  the room is very dark
3469: The Red Eyes tell you to post in the World Edit Forum Game

wuts that 

3480 a falcon 9

Floor 3482: The weird abberation that bounced you around floors and confused is finally over. You now step out on the correct floor.

Unfortunately this floor contains the Vogon Red Tape Bureau. You may be here awhile.
After finally getting out of there, you step onto floor 3483, which has... An infinite amount of fans??? (As in the air-movers)

Floor 3484: You accidentally swoop up to this floor after flying around for hours on the floor below, buoyed by the the fans all pointing up.

This floor is filled with one million comfy cushions. You have a nice nap.

You wake up from your nap. As you look around and realize you went one floor up while sleeping, you somehow get off all the cushions and make your way upstairs to

Floor 3486

It’s a totally blank space. You half-expect Q to pop up and tell you that you have a heart condition. But nothing happens, and the eerie silence compels you go up to <insert next floor>
Floor 3487: A filter. You infiltrate through.
Floor 3488: Oops, now you are in hot water. That was a coffee filter. Better swim fast before you get steamed up.
Floor 3489: you indeed swim up, only to somehow find yourself inside a hot air balloon's envelope, and then you fall into the basket. The hot air balloon rises up to...
Floor 3490: It's cold. The air balloon slows down.
Floor 3491: The hot air balloon eventually lands in the glorious country of Thinland.
